title: Which series of Samsung mobile is best? - Quora

response.answer_text: Samsung series of smartphones are split on price and performance levels as follows: Flagship/premium phones - Galaxy S series and Note series - the most expensive and the most performant Samsung phones currently available.Mid-range - Galaxy A series - mid range performance and price, cheaper than S series, but decent performance.Low-range - Galaxy J series - low priced phones and the least performant phones.These are the three main ranges of Samsung Galaxy series. Price wise, they might differ from store to store or from one region to another. However, specs wise, you can compare Galaxy Note 8 vs Galaxy A8(2018) vs Galaxy J2 Pro (2018)

The best Samsung smartphone in the price / quality ratio is the Galaxy A70 with a good 4400 mAh battery. The model received a large 6.41 "display based on Super AMOLED with an aspect ratio of 19.5: 9. The picture quality has a record figure of 402 ppi. The high-performance device is powered by a powerful Qualcomm Snapdragon 710 chip with a maximum frequency of 2.2 GHz. Adreno 616 is used as a graphics accelerator. It operates on the basis of the Android v9.0 operating system with a proprietary Pie shell. For less than 40,000 rubles, users get 4 GB of RAM and 64 gigabytes of internal memory. a dual 12MP main camera that allows you to take pictures at the flagship level.The front camera received 24 megapixels with HDR support.
